scripts.build: npm run clean ; tsc ; echo "Finished Building"
scripts.heroku-prebuild: yarn remove puppeteer puppeteer-extra puppeteer-extra-plugin-adblocker puppeteer-extra-plugin-stealth -D && yarn add puppeteer@^13.1.3 puppeteer-extra@^3.2.3 puppeteer-extra-plugin-adblocker@^2.12.0 puppeteer-extra-plugin-stealth@^2.9.0
scripts.cron: npm run kill-inspect && NODE_ENV=local PORT=3005 tsnd --inspect=4006 --respawn --transpile-only --ignore-watch=src/types/meem.generated.ts --ignore-watch=src/types/meem.public.generated.ts src/cron/cron.ts
scripts.local: npm run kill-inspect && NODE_ENV=local PORT=3005 tsnd --exit-child --inspect=4005 --respawn --transpile-only --ignore-watch=src/types/meem.generated.ts --ignore-watch=src/types/meem.public.generated.ts src/server.ts
scripts.#test: NODE_ENV=local DISABLE_MIGRATIONS=true ALLOW_NON_SSL=true ORM_LOGGING=false LOG_LEVEL=debug TESTING=true ENABLE_GUNDB=false GENERATE_SHARED_TYPES=false PORT= mocha --exit -r ts-node/register/transpile-only 'src/**/*.test.ts'
scripts.test: DISABLE_ORM_SYNC=false NODE_ENV=local DISABLE_MIGRATIONS=true ALLOW_NON_SSL=true ORM_LOGGING=false LOG_LEVEL=debug TESTING=true ENABLE_GUNDB=false GENERATE_SHARED_TYPES=false PORT= DATABASE_URL=sqlite:./tmp/testing.db ENABLE_CONTRACT_LISTENERS=false ENABLE_TWITTER_LISTENERS=false mocha --exit -r ts-node/register/transpile-only 'src/**/*.test.ts'
scripts.docker:clean: docker exec -it deploy_linux bash -i -c "cd /app; rm -rf node_modules"
scripts.docker:installYarn: docker exec -it deploy_linux bash -i -c "cd /app; npm i -g yarn"
scripts.docker:build: docker exec -it deploy_linux bash -i -c "cd /app; yarn build"
scripts.docker:deploy:dev: docker exec -it deploy_linux bash -i -c "cd /app; source src/.env.dev; yarn deploy:dev"
scripts.docker:deploy:staging: npm run build:serverless && docker exec -it deploy_linux bash -i -c "cd /app; source src/.env.staging.sls; npm install --production && npm run deploy:staging"
scripts.docker:deploy:production: npm run build:serverless && docker exec -it deploy_linux bash -i -c "cd /app; source src/.env.production.sls; rm -rf node_modules && npm install --production && npm run deploy:production"
scripts.postinstall: if [ "${RUN_POSTINSTALL:="false"}" = "true" ]; then npm run build; else echo "Skipping postinstall RUN_POSTINSTALL is not set to true." && exit 0; fi
